Title: The Lego Batman Movie
Writer: Seth Grahame-Smith, Chris McKenna, Erik Sommers, Jared Stern (additional screenplay material by), John Whittington (additional screenplay material by), Bob Kane (Batman created by), Bill Finger (Batman created by)
Actors: Jenny Slate, Will Arnett, Ralph Fiennes, Zach Galifianakis
Plot: Bruce Wayne must not only deal with the criminals of Gotham City, but also the responsibility of raising a boy he adopted.
